entry.title: 62Gerente/curriculum-vitae
entry.summary:
My Curriculum Vitae, typesetted in Helvetica Neue, using XeTeX, TikZ and Biblatex

My Curriculum Vitae

About

=========

Latest version of my curriculum vitae, using TikZ for the header, XeTeX and fontspec to use Helvetica Neue and textpos for the aside.

Currently only on Portuguese, working on the English version.

Layout: afriggeri/cv

Website

=========

Visit my personal page andre-santos.pt

entry.title: rossmounce/CV
entry.summary:
Ross Mounce's CV

CV

These are the source files for my CV.

It was built using the tutorial by ?Kamil Wojcicki? 'latex — professional résumé layout made simple' here: http://linux.dsplabs.com.au/resume-writing-example-latex-template-linux-curriculum-vitae-professional-cv-layout-format-text-p54/

I don't know much about latex, so much of the spacing in my CV might seem fairly hacky ;)

If you find it useful please do fork it and make your own! The real magic is in the template file which I didn't create.
